TEXT.TITLE: ERC INTERNATIONAL <ERC> GETS 17 MLN DLR CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: ERC International Inc said it has received a three-year 17 mln dlr U.S. Navyt contract to provide engineering, technical and administrative support sevices on weapons systems, subsystems and associated management, manpower and support systems. Reuter
